articles.title: China-built EVs hit with EU tariffs; Nio says it may have to raise prices in Europe - CNBC
articles.description: Europe on Thursday confirmed tariff increases on electric vehicles imported from China to the continent with automakers criticizing the move.
articles.content: The European Union on Thursday confirmed its decision to hike tariffs on electric vehicles imported from China with one automaker issuing fresh warnings that it may have to raise prices as a result. … [+3465 chars]
